attributes.action: Remove the title Right Honourable from MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs have uniformly shown they are certainly not "Honourable" as demonstrated most eloquently by the current expenses scandal. It would serve as a simple reminder to them to have their title shortened to just "MP" after their name.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
